ogr2ogrOptions.sql: ALTER TABLE driver ADD COLUMN uuid text DEFAULT uuid_in(overlay(overlay(md5(random()::text || ':' || random()::text) placing '4' from 13) placing to_hex(floor(random()*(11-8+1) + 8)::int)::text from 17)::cstring);
